# Multi-Model Orchestration Design
Created: 2025-10-12
Project: FWBer.me

## Executive Summary

This architecture enables orchestrating 9+ AI models in parallel using:
- Models: Claude 4.5, GPT-5-Codex, GPT-5, Gemini 2.5, code-supernova-1-million, Grok 4, cheetah
- Infrastructure: Multiple CLI tools + IDE plugins with MCP support  
- Communication: Serena MCP as persistent memory bus
- Orchestrator: Claude 4.5 (this session type)

Key features: True parallel execution, persistent sessions, zero interference, inter-model awareness.
